description:
When a user first accesses the Solve module with no history, show an interactive overlay tutorial that walks through entering a sample question, explains the analysis and solve loops, and demonstrates how citations appear. Include skip and 'Show me later' options with progress tracking.

**Rationale:** The Solve agent's dual-loop architecture (Analysis Loop + Solve Loop) is complex. Without guidance, users may not understand what questions to ask or how the system uses knowledge bases and tools to generate answers. A tutorial reduces confusion and improves initial engagement.
title: Guided First-Run Tutorial for Solve Agent
